Name: Website Redesign Quote
description_c: Complete website redesign with modern UI/UX, responsive design, and content management system integration.
items_c: Design consultation, Frontend development, Backend integration, Testing and deployment
notes_c: Client prefers modern, minimalist design. Requires integration with existing CRM system.

Name: Mobile App Development
description_c: Native mobile application development for iOS and Android platforms with real-time synchronization.
items_c: UI/UX Design, iOS Development, Android Development, API Integration, Testing
notes_c: Priority project. Client needs MVP ready by Q2. Consider phased delivery approach.

Name: E-commerce Platform Setup
description_c: Complete e-commerce solution with inventory management, payment processing, and analytics dashboard.
items_c: Platform setup, Payment gateway integration, Inventory system, Analytics dashboard, Training
notes_c: Client accepted quote. Ready to proceed with implementation. Start date confirmed for February 1st.

Name: Digital Marketing Campaign
description_c: Comprehensive digital marketing strategy including SEO, social media management, and PPC campaigns.
items_c: SEO audit and optimization, Social media strategy, PPC campaign setup, Content creation, Monthly reporting
notes_c: Client decided to go with different agency. Keep for future reference and potential re-engagement.

Name: Cloud Migration Services
description_c: Complete migration of on-premise infrastructure to cloud with security optimization and cost analysis.
items_c: Infrastructure assessment, Migration planning, Cloud setup, Security configuration, Staff training
notes_c: Large enterprise client. Requires detailed security compliance documentation. Schedule follow-up meeting.

Name: Custom CRM Development
description_c: Custom CRM solution tailored for sales team workflows with advanced reporting and integration capabilities.
items_c: Requirements analysis, Database design, Frontend development, Integrations, User training
notes_c: Client reviewing quote. Scheduled demo for next week. Emphasize customization capabilities.

Name: Cybersecurity Audit
description_c: Comprehensive cybersecurity assessment and implementation of security protocols for financial institution.
items_c: Security audit, Vulnerability assessment, Protocol implementation, Staff training, Compliance documentation
notes_c: High priority client in financial sector. Requires strict compliance with banking regulations.

Name: API Development & Integration
description_c: RESTful API development with third-party integrations and comprehensive documentation.
items_c: API design, Development, Third-party integrations, Documentation, Testing
notes_c: Technical client with specific API requirements. Focus on scalability and documentation quality.

Name: Data Analytics Platform
description_c: Business intelligence platform with real-time dashboards, automated reporting, and predictive analytics.
items_c: Data modeling, Dashboard development, Reporting automation, Predictive analytics, User training
notes_c: Client interested in advanced analytics capabilities. Showcase previous BI projects in presentation.

Name: DevOps Implementation
description_c: Complete DevOps pipeline setup with CI/CD, automated testing, and infrastructure as code.
items_c: Pipeline setup, Automated testing, Infrastructure as code, Monitoring setup, Team training
notes_c: Growing tech company looking to scale development processes. Focus on automation and efficiency gains.
